name: Shima Enaga Ring Run
description:
Just a game about a birb flying over the ocean, and also collecting rings that magically spawn out of thin air, video game logic is weird.

But yeah, this is just a small minigame I made since I wanted to finally finish at least one of the games in the myriads of game projects I never completed.

I hope you like it :)

Btw, the controls for the game are the WASD and arrow keys
